Localization.Name: Shiv
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Unknown
Item Type: Knife
Class: Melee

Size: N/A

A deadly, improvised knife made by an industrious prisoner by securing a sharpened piece of metal to an OxyPen with a bit of thin cord. Considered contraband within prison facilities.
